alert.note: Alert for Buchanan; Delaware; Dubuque (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 05 at 11:31PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Buchanan, Delaware and Dubuque Counties through 1215 AM CDT... At 1130 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Delaware, or near Manchester, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could cause minor tree limb damage and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Dubuque, Manchester, Asbury, Dyersville, Epworth, Farley, Peosta, Edgewood, Earlville, Delhi, New Vienna, Colesburg, Worthington, Holy Cross, Greeley, Luxemburg, Rickardsville, Sherrill, Dundee and Delaware. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
